text: Reverence to the Hound God - I
Champions of the Hound God stand here—tremble before the savage hunt that approaches!
Reverence to the Raven God - I
Champions of the Raven God stand here—slay everything, and let it feast on the rotting flesh!
Reverence to the Eagle God - I
Champions of the Eagle God stand here—fear the shadow it casts silently from above!
Reverence to the Serpent God - I
Champions of the Serpent God stand here—tremble at its serpentine form emerging from Norsca's abyss!
